sentences.english: This is my first stand-alone blog , and it's still under construction.
sentences.chinese: 這是我的第一個獨立博客，還在建設中。

sentences.english: Blog membership must be managed from the group itself.
sentences.chinese: 博客成員關係必須由羣組本身管理。

sentences.english: If you want your blog to make money, treat it like a business.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想用你的博客來賺錢，就像經商一樣對待它吧。

sentences.english: I have visited many blogs of Sina lately, and my blog had some visitors.
sentences.chinese: 近來訪問了很多新浪博客，同時也得到一些博友來訪。

sentences.english: Topics covered include subscribing to the blog and utilizing the different search features. To view the screencast, click here.
sentences.chinese: 涵蓋的主題包括如何訂閱博客和使用搜索功能。
關於IIS服務器的安全的博客帖子。

sentences.english: Specifically, in the blogosphere, the vast majority of blogs have very few readers.
sentences.chinese: 特別是在博客圈，大多數的博客都只有寥寥幾名讀者。

sentences.english: Specifically, in the blogosphere, the vast majority of blogs have very few readers.
sentences.chinese: 特別是在博客圈，大多數的博客都只有寥寥幾名讀者。

sentences.english: You have to edit it quickly for a blog entry, a presentation or your grand-ma, who learned to send emails.
sentences.chinese: 隆重介紹你要編輯的博客條目，很快發送電子郵件。

sentences.english: Try making multiple blogs and 'sso have them most link to one main site.
sentences.chinese: 可嘗試羣建博客並充分誑騙其反向鏈接。

sentences.english: Today, in the form of blogging software or services like Facebook, it is free.
sentences.chinese: 但是現在，無論是博客還是臉譜網都是免費的。

sentences.english: Painting, woodworking, sculpting, programming or blogging are all great starts.
sentences.chinese: 繪畫，做木工，雕刻，編程和寫博客都是很好的開始。

sentences.english: Jam-packing a blog layout with too many things.
sentences.chinese: 用過多的東西過度包裝博客版面。

sentences.english: Isn't really that hard to find pro-blogging jobs.
sentences.chinese: 找到一份職業博客的工作也不難。

sentences.english: Since the example application is a blog, you get to take a shortcut.
sentences.chinese: 因示例應用程序是一個博客，我們可以走個捷徑。

definition: blog article/to write a blog article (netspeak)
Sina, Chinese web portal and online media company
